message.content: This question requires knowledge about reflective surfaces. Option (A) is incorrect because a tar pit does not provide a reflective surface. Option (B) is incorrect because a deep cave is usually dark and does not provide a reflective surface. Option (D) is incorrect because an abyss refers to a deep, dark hole and does not provide a reflective surface.
